# transform

**Instance Property**

A matrix encoding the position, orientation, and scale of the anchor relative to the world coordinate space of the AR session the anchor is placed in.

## Declaration

```swift
var transform: simd_float4x4 { get }
```

## Discussion

World coordinate space in ARKit always follows a right-handed convention, but is oriented based on the session configuration. For details, see [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/understanding-world-tracking].

## Tracking Anchors

- **identifier**: A unique identifier for the anchor.
- **sessionIdentifier**: The unique identifier of the session that owns this anchor.
